import { useParams } from "react-router" import { useSelector } from "react-redux" import { useEffect, useState } from "react" const EditMovie = () => { const {id} = useParams() const movies = Object.values(useSelector(state => state.movies)) const [movie, setMovie] = useState(movies.find(movie => movie._id === id)) return ( <>

Edit Movie: {movie.Name}

setMovie({...movie, Name: e.target.value})}/>
handleChange(e)}/>
setMovie({...movie, Image: e.target.value})}/>
setMovie({...movie, Premiered: e.target.value})}/>
) } export default EditMovie
